column2: The last time I talked to the loan servicer; they said my payment was $1,900 per month. Helhoski recommends using this Federal Student Aid’s Loan Simulator to see how much you might pay under different plans.
column4: ‘Any reasonable payment will not even cover the interest.’ I have 4 degrees and owe $197K in student loans. I’m now 55, have no savings, and am struggling. What should I do?
